summary: How will VHA provide quality health care to veterans? The Veterans Health Administration provided health care to 6.7 million veterans in fiscal year 2015. However, changes in the veteran population (such as more female veterans) could affect VHA's current strategies to provide quality health care. Effective strategic planning—such as identifying goals and methods to achieve them—can help VHA respond to the changing health care needs...
title: Veterans Health Care: Improvements Needed in Operationalizing Strategic Goals and Objectives
